sqlquery.name: query.sdr.sdrdb
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( select C1 as ProductID, C650000001 as Product_Code, C650000002 as Product_Name, C650000003 as Product_State, C650000004 as Product_OPDP, C650000005 as Product_OPType, C650000006 as Product_KeyWord, C650000007 as Product_Desc, C650000008 as Product_OtherDesc, C650000009 as Product_DSRecordUser, C650000010 as Product_DSRecordTime, C650000011 as Product_DSRecordDP, C650000012 as Product_DSRecordTel, C650000013 as Product_TSRecordUser, C650000014 as Product_TSRecordTime, C650000015 as Product_TSRecordDP, C650000016 as Product_TSRecordTel, C650000017 as Product_EXRecordUser, C650000018 as Product_EXRecordTime, C650000019 as Product_EXRecordDP, C650000020 as Product_EXRecordTel from {WF:EL_SDR_DI_DB} sdr where C3 > 0 $basequery$ )
